name: SoulWhispers
description: A mindfulness and emotional wellness app designed to help users reconnect with their inner calm. Through guided meditations, reflective journaling, and AI-powered mood tracking, SoulWhispers nurtures mental clarity and emotional resilience.

name: GymKey
